message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer and I believe you'll love it. I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $800000. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I believe it's a great product, but I have to consider my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand that you have a budget constraint, but I believe the product's value is worth more than $600000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $750000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $650000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Hi Bob, I'm starting to think you're getting a good deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $725000. This is my final offer, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me at this price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $680000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I'm starting to think you're really interested in the product, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $700000. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $690000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I've made a lot of concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm going to make a take-it-or-leave-it offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $720000. This is my final offer, and if you don't accept, I'll have to consider other options.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I'm not willing to pay $720000. I'm willing to pay $680000 for the product. This is my final offer, but I think we both know I'm not going to accept it.
